$comment: A message the back-end sends to clients when they subscribe to a LAO. It informs clients about the servers public key and its peers for this lao

server_address.description: Canonical address of the server with a protocol prefix and the port number

client_address.description: Canonical address of the server with a protocol prefix and the port number

peers.description: A list of peers the server is connected to (excluding itself). These can be other organizers or witnesses

address.description: Canonical address of the peer with a protocol prefix and the port number
